prevent-closing-screens.name: Prevent Closing Screens
prevent-closing-screens.description:
Prevents the server from forcefully closing your screens. For example, your chat screen when a Hypixel SkyWars game starts.

Created by Moulberry in MoulberrysTweaks.

dont-reset-cursor.name: Don't Reset Cursor
dont-reset-cursor.description:
Keeps your cursor in the same spot when opening a new screen immediately after the last. For example, backpack slots in Hypixel SkyBlock.

Created by nea89o in Firmament.

Automatically disabled when Firmament is installed.

click-out-of-containers.name: Click Out of Containers
click-out-of-containers.description: Allows clicking outside the bounds of a container to close it.

container-background-opacity.name: Container Background Opacity
container-background-opacity.description: Set the transparency of container backgrounds.

container-texture-opacity.name: Container Texture Opacity
container-texture-opacity.description: Set the transparency of container textures.

container-scale.name: Container GUI Scale
container-scale.description:
Allows setting a different GUI scale for containers, such as your inventory or chests.

This feature currently has issues with REI, as well as a few depth and screen resizing issues.

remove-recipe-book-shift.name: Remove Recipe Book Shift
remove-recipe-book-shift.description: Prevents the recipe book from shifting the inventory when opening/closing. This makes no attempt to fit the recipe book in your screen if your GUI scale is too large.
